LanguageData.Ship_BeamMech_Unpowered.label: 机械船体（无动力）
LanguageData.Ship_BeamMech_Unpowered.description: 用于组成机械飞船的重要外部结构，内部并未嵌有电缆、氧气管道和热能管道。
LanguageData.Ship_BeamMech.label: 机械船体
LanguageData.Ship_BeamMech.description: The outer structural elements of a mechanoid ship's hull. Includes conduits for power and coolant. Integrated lighting system can be toggled at will if the Advanced Lighting research project is completed.
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Light_Mech.label: ship light
LanguageData.Ship_Beam_Light_Mech.description: Integrated lighting attached to a ship's hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneOne_Mech.label: hull corner (1x1)
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneOne_Mech.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneOne_MechFlip.label: hull corner (1x1) flip
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneOne_MechFlip.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneTwo_Mech.label: hull corner (1x2)
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneTwo_Mech.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneTwoFlip_Mech.label: hull corner (1x2) flip
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneTwoFlip_Mech.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneThree_Mech.label: hull corner (1x3)
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneThree_Mech.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneThreeFlip_Mech.label: hull corner (1x3) flip
LanguageData.Ship_Corner_OneThreeFlip_Mech.descriptio: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull.
LanguageData.ShipInside_SolarGeneratorMech.label: mechanoid solar generator
LanguageData.ShipInside_SolarGeneratorMech.descriptio: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.
LanguageData.ShipInside_PassiveVentMechanoid.label: mechanoid ship vent
LanguageData.ShipInside_PassiveVentMechanoid.descript: Exchanges heat with the coolant network, cooling or heating a ship's interior to the desired temperature.\n\nCan also heat rooms with electricity.
LanguageData.ShipAirlockMech.label: mechanoid ship airlock
LanguageData.ShipAirlockMech.description: Allows access to a ship or divides rooms inside it. Low-energy plasma barriers prevent gases from escaping.
LanguageData.ShipHullTileMech.label: mechanoid hull plating
LanguageData.ShipHullTileMech.description: Spaceworthy hull plating built by mechanoids.
LanguageData.ShipInside_PassiveCoolerMechanoid.label: mechanoid ship radiator
LanguageData.ShipInside_PassiveCoolerMechanoid.descri: 能向太空中快速排放热量并冷却飞船内部的散热器，也能为飞船炮塔和护盾发生器提供少量的热容。\n\n当隐形装置或护盾发生器开启时，飞船散热器将无法向太空中排放热量。
